// Mini Template
#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#include <set>
#include <map>
#include <sstream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;
typedef unsigned long long ULL;

//FASTIO
char *ipos, *opos, InpFile[20000000], OutFile[20000000], DIP[20];
inline int input(int flag=0) {

	while(*ipos <= 32) ++ipos;
	if ( flag  ) return (*ipos++ - '0'); /* For getting Boolean Characters */
	int x=0, neg = 0;char c;
	while( true ) {
		c=*ipos++;
		if(c == '-')
			neg = 1;
		else{
			if (c<=32) return neg?-x:x;
			x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
		}
	}
}
inline void output(int x,int flag = 1) {
	if(x<0){
		*opos++='-';
		x *= -1;
	}
	int y,dig=0;
	while(x||!dig){y=x/10;DIP[dig++]=x-((y << 3) + (y << 1))+'0';x=y;}
	while(dig--) *opos++=DIP[dig];
	*opos++= flag ? '\n' : ' ';
}
inline void InitFASTIO() {
	ipos = InpFile; opos = OutFile;
	read(0, InpFile,20000000);
}
inline void FlushFASTIO() {
	write(1, OutFile,opos-OutFile);
}
//FASTIO FINISHED

#define TR(c, it) for(typeof(c.begin()) it = c.begin(); it != c.end(); it++)
#define REP(i, n) for(int i = 0; i<(n); i++)
#define REPSE(i, s, e) for(int i = s; i <(e); i++)
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define FILL(x, c) memset(x, c, sizeof(x))
#define ALL(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define FIN(x, c) (x.find(c)!=x.end())
#define IN(x, c) (find(x.begin(), x.end(), c)!=x.end())
// Template Ends

#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
// ONLINE_JUDGE true on codechef
// some code in here
#endif

int ss;
multiset<int> s;
int mk[3333];

int main() {
    InitFASTIO();
    int T, t, m , w, c;
    T = input();


    while(T--) {
        t = input();
        m = input();
		w = input();
		c = input();

		c = min(c , min( m * 12, min ( (m + w) * 4, t * 4 / 5) ) );
		t -= c;
		w = min(w, min( 2 * m, t*2/3) );
		t -= w;
		m = min(t, m);
        output(m,0);
		output(w,0);
		output(c);
    }
    FlushFASTIO();
}
